actions.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. With written report No. 101-348.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 663.

official_title: An original resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate for the use of the recording studio and mass mailings with respect to uncontested elections.

summary.text: Amends rule XL of the Standing Rules of the Senate to exempt candidates in uncontested Senate elections from the 60-day pre-election moratorium on use of the frank for mass mailings and use of the Senate or House radio and television studios.

titles.title: An original resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate for the use of the recording studio and mass mailings with respect to uncontested elections.
